title_full: MIGPER01-BP01 Understand the performance characteristics of your current infrastructure to select the best performant optimized cloud infrastructure
title: Understand the performance characteristics of your current infrastructure to select the best performant optimized cloud infrastructure
description: Use discovery tools for a comprehensive view of IT inventory. Discovery tools offer enhanced visibility into physical servers, virtual machines, applications and their inter-dependencies, enabling better planning and decision-making during migration.
outcome: Comprehensive understanding of current infrastructure performance characteristics using discovery tools to inform right-sizing decisions for AWS resources.

title_full: MIGPER02-BP01 Evaluate operating systems and versions that are running in your environment
title: Evaluate operating systems and versions that are running in your environment
description: Consider assessment for legacy workload migration including mainframe, midrange, or UNIX proprietary systems. Evaluate emulation and virtualization approaches for non-x86 architectures.
outcome: Comprehensive evaluation of OS platforms with migration plan for legacy systems including emulation or virtualization strategies.

title_full: MIGPER03-BP01 Evaluate the different methods to migrate data and select the one best for your use case: online mode, offline mode, or hybrid approach
title: Evaluate different methods to migrate data and select the best for your use case
description: Review AWS Cloud Data Migration services for online, offline, and hybrid data transfer options. Consider amount of data, transfer time, frequency, bandwidth, network costs, and security concerns when selecting migration method.
outcome: Appropriate data migration method selected based on data volume, bandwidth, timeline, and security requirements.

title_full: MIGPER04-BP01 Select the storage solution based on the characteristics of your workloads
title: Select the storage solution based on the characteristics of your workloads
description: Identify and document workload storage needs including shareable access, file size, growth rate, throughput, IOPS, latency, access patterns, and persistence of data. Use these characteristics to evaluate if block, file, or object storage is appropriate.
outcome: Storage solution selected based on workload characteristics and access patterns.

title_full: MIGPER04-BP02 Choose the optimal storage solutions for specialized workloads, such as SAP and VMware cloud on AWS
title: Choose the optimal storage solutions for specialized workloads
description: Select appropriate storage solutions for specialized workloads like SAP and VMware on AWS that meet their specific performance requirements.
outcome: Optimal storage solutions selected for specialized workloads with validated performance characteristics.

title_full: MIGPER04-BP03 Evaluate the different storage tiers at prices to meet your migrated workload's performance
title: Evaluate different storage tiers to meet your migrated workload's performance
description: Evaluate different storage tiers and their performance characteristics to select the appropriate tier for your workload requirements.
outcome: Storage tier selected that balances performance and cost for workload requirements.

title_full: MIGPER05-BP01 Establish a reliable network connectivity from on-premises to AWS to ensure performance
title: Establish reliable network connectivity from on-premises to AWS to ensure performance
description: Establish reliable network connectivity to ensure adequate performance during migration, considering bandwidth, latency, and reliability requirements.
outcome: Reliable network connectivity established with adequate bandwidth and low latency for migration.

title_full: MIGPER05-BP02 Assure that network performance is not impacted by external factors
title: Assure that network performance is not impacted by external factors
description: Ensure network performance remains consistent and is not negatively impacted by external factors during migration.
outcome: Network performance validated and protected from external factors that could impact migration.

title_full: MIGPER06-BP01 Identify a migration strategy for your network components (DNS, IP addressing, and DHCP) migration
title: Identify a migration strategy for your network components
description: Develop a comprehensive migration strategy for network components including DNS, IP addressing, and DHCP to ensure smooth transition and performance.
outcome: Network component migration strategy defined covering DNS, IP addressing, and DHCP requirements.

title_full: MIGPER07-BP01 Identify the right CloudWatch metrics to capture or detect anomaly and identify performance blockers for shared services
title: Identify the right CloudWatch metrics to capture or detect anomaly for shared services
description: Identify the right metrics and detect anomalies using CloudWatch Metrics Insights, anomaly detection, and metrics explorer to maintain oversight during and after resource migration.
outcome: CloudWatch metrics identified and configured with anomaly detection for performance monitoring.

title_full: MIGPER07-BP02 Select the best performing cloud infrastructure that can scale for additional workloads in future without any performance impact
title: Select the best performing cloud infrastructure that can scale for additional workloads
description: Select the best performing architecture from storage, database, compute, and network perspective that can scale as you migrate additional applications. Use existing reference patterns for architecture to achieve a cost-effective solution.
outcome: Scalable, high-performing architecture selected based on reference patterns and best practices.

title_full: MIGPER07-BP03 Reduce the blast radius for performance impact into a single account
title: Reduce the blast radius for performance impact into a single account
description: Organize your AWS accounts to isolate performance impact using account structuring with AWS Organizations. This reduces the blast radius and safeguards performance.
outcome: Account structure designed to isolate performance impact and reduce blast radius.

title_full: MIGPER07-BP04 Benchmark existing workloads for performance
title: Benchmark existing workloads for performance
description: Benchmark the performance of existing workloads to understand how they perform on the cloud. Use custom or industry standard benchmarks, pre-warm test environments, and run benchmarks multiple times to capture variance.
outcome: Performance benchmarks established for existing workloads to inform cloud architecture decisions.

title_full: MIGPER08-BP01 Perform stress and user acceptance tests on migrated workloads before the actual cutover
title: Perform stress and user acceptance tests on migrated workloads before cutover
description: Perform stress and user acceptance tests for quality check before the actual cutover. Run tests in test or staging environments at least two weeks prior to cutover to allow time to fix any issues.
outcome: Stress and user acceptance testing completed with sufficient time for issue remediation before cutover.

title_full: MIGPER08-BP02 Review and implement the lessons learned from previous migration waves
title: Review and implement lessons learned from previous migration waves
description: Take note of lessons learned from previous migration waves and evolve the migration wave plan based on lessons learned and changing business priorities. Keep the wave plan up to date to reflect and track what is being delivered.
outcome: Migration wave plan continuously improved based on lessons learned from previous waves.

title_full: MIGPER08-BP03 Perform a Well-Architected Framework Review on each iteration of the migrated workload
title: Perform a Well-Architected Framework Review on each iteration of the migrated workload
description: Review Well-Architected best practices after each migration wave. Review current and target state architectures for future waves to see what can be improved performance-wise. Review the 7 Rs migration strategy after each wave.
outcome: Well-Architected Framework Review completed after each migration wave with continuous architecture improvement.

title_full: MIGPER09-BP01 Generate alarm-based notifications for metric's threshold breach
title: Generate alarm-based notifications for metric's threshold breach
description: Generate alarm-based notifications using Amazon CloudWatch and Amazon SNS. Monitor workload performance to identify degradations and bottlenecks, and remediate them automatically.
outcome: Alarm-based notifications configured for performance metrics with automated remediation where possible.

title_full: MIGPER09-BP02 Determine the need for a real-time or a near real-time monitoring solution
title: Determine the need for real-time or near real-time monitoring solution
description: Determine whether real-time or near real-time monitoring is needed based on workload requirements and implement appropriate monitoring solution.
outcome: Monitoring solution implemented with appropriate latency for workload requirements.

title_full: MIGPER09-BP03 Implement CloudWatch or a Quicksight dashboard as a single pane view for visualizing all metrics
title: Implement CloudWatch or Quicksight dashboard as single pane view for visualizing metrics
description: Implement a single pane of glass dashboard using CloudWatch or QuickSight for visualizing all relevant metrics.
outcome: Centralized dashboard implemented providing comprehensive view of all performance metrics.

title_full: MIGPER09-BP04 Set up automated testing for your application metrics
title: Set up automated testing for your application metrics
description: Set up automated testing for application metrics to continuously validate performance requirements.
outcome: Automated testing configured for continuous performance validation.

title_full: MIGPER09-BP05 Re-evaluate your compute usage with AWS Trusted Advisor, AWS Compute Optimizer, or partner tools
title: Re-evaluate compute usage with AWS Trusted Advisor, AWS Compute Optimizer, or partner tools
description: Use AWS Trusted Advisor, AWS Compute Optimizer, or partner tools to continuously re-evaluate and optimize compute usage.
outcome: Compute usage continuously optimized using AWS tools and recommendations.
